tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditional - Finished T79 at 2015 Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament
tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Made one start on the Web.com Tour. Was T2 after 54 holes in the BMW Charity Pro-Am, two strokes behind eventual winner Rod Pampling. A final-round 76 derailed his chances dropping him to T26.

Has three career wins on the NGA Hooters Tour. 

2011: Missed the cut in both of his Web.com Tour starts.

2010: Played in three Web.com Tour events, recording his first top-25 at the South Georgia Classic (T13).
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Named Mr. Golf in Kentucky in 2000.
tourBios.personal: Biggest thrill in golf was making a hole-in-one for $50,000...Favorite course he's played is Merion GC...Favorite teams include the University of Kentucky and the Cincinnati Bengals...Never travels without his fishing rods...Dream foursome would include his father, Jack Nicklaus and Tiger Woods...His entrance song to the first tee would be "The Gambler" by Kenny Rogers...Has one brother and one sister...Attended St. Patrick High School in Maysville, Ky...Twitter account is @mblakefield.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Web.com Tour was T13th in 2010 at the South Georgia Classic Pres'd by First State Bank and Trust Company.
